author: arizzi
body:
New version of  track covariance for MiniAOD based on meanvalues, compression ranges and compression methods specified in versionable root file from DataFormats/PatCandidates/data while event by event only the id of the method. (developments from @gmandorl)

The expected size change depends on PU. It should zero or slightly negative on noPU and the increase should be below 1Kb/ev on relval ttbar w/ PU. 

*Update:* the working point has been changed to a slightly more expensive one, increase on ttbar w/PU ~600bytes/ev compared to previous version.

*Update:* the code should be backward compatible, reading old MiniAOD should produce meaningful result. 

@gpetruc 

NB: the PR is being tested with recent IB for final size increase and validation of output (all validation tests where made with 80X and several changes have been introduced to merge in 91X)
title: MiniAOD new track covariance parameterization
